messages.text: URGENT: Your account has been compromised. Click here to secure your account immediately: bit.ly/secure-acc
messages.explanation: This message creates false urgency and contains a suspicious shortened URL.

messages.text: Congratulations! You've been selected for a $1000 Amazon gift card. Claim now: amzn-gift.com/claim
messages.explanation: This is a classic 'too good to be true' scam with a suspicious domain name.

messages.text: Your package delivery #45782 is pending. Please confirm your address: tracking-delivery-service.net
messages.explanation: This message impersonates a delivery service with a suspicious domain.

messages.text: Your appointment with Dr. Smith is confirmed for tomorrow at 2:30 PM. Reply YES to confirm or call (555) 123-4567 to reschedule.
messages.explanation: This is a standard appointment reminder with clear contact information.

messages.text: Your Amazon order #302-9584736-2956743 has shipped. Track your package here: amazon.com/track
messages.explanation: This message includes a specific order number and links to the official Amazon domain.
